entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Periods of rain along the coast. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 near noon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
